auto_execute_script.message: Automaticky spustiš skript po načítaní YouTube™ na karte.

auto_pause_videos.message: Automatically pause videos opened in background tabs.

auto_remove_ads.message: Automatické odstránenie reklám, keď sú detekované.

auto_select_quality.message: Automatické prehrávanie videa v mnou preferovanej kvalite.

auto_sort_comments.message: Automatically sort comments from newest to oldest.

cinema_mode_enlarge_player.message: Automaticky zväčšiť video prehrávač, ak je zapnutý Kino mód.

clean_button_instructions.message: Info: Make a right click on this button to show/hide annotations.

configure_keyboard_shortcuts.message: Info: Zadajte opera://settings/configureCommands do adresného riadku pre nastavenie klávesových skratiek.

control_volume.message: Hlasitosť zvuku pomocou kolieska myši, keď je kurzor nad video prehrávačom.

custom_script_instructions.message: Prilepte, alebo zadajte JavaScript kód a následne ho uložte tlačidlom nižšie. Ak ho chcete použiť, kliknite na "Vlastný skript" na lište.

custom_script_warning.message: Warning: For security reasons you should only use code that you understand or code that has been written by a developer you trust.

custom_theme_instructions.message: Paste or type your CSS code here, then save it using the button below.

description.message: Tons of features to improve your user experience on YouTube™.

disable_preloading.message: Disable preloading when videos are automatically paused.

filters_button_instructions.message: Info: Make a right click on this button to modify filters. You can also enable/disable filters if you maintain the "Control" key (Ctrl) and the "Shift" key pressed when you click the video player.

ignore_playlists.message: Do not pause videos in playlists.

pause_foreground_tab.message: Pause videos opened in the foreground tab too.

pause_videos.message: Pause videos playing in background tabs when a video starts playing in the foreground tab.

pin_video_player.message: Pin the video player at the bottom of the screen when scrolling down the page.

rate_message.message: If you like Enhancer for YouTube™ and want it to be maintained and improved please rate it with five stars now. Writing a review is recommended but not mandatory, so if you don't have time to write one or if you want to stay anonymous online it's not a problem, you can rate anonymously, what matters is that you give it ★★★★★. Thank you!

share_message.message: Tell your friends and followers about Enhancer for YouTube™. Thank you!

speed_button_instructions.message: Info: Use the mouse wheel to control playback speed when hovering this button with the mouse cursor. Click it to use the default playback speed. You can also use the mouse wheel to control playback speed when hovering the video player, and click it to use the default playback speed, if you maintain the "Control" key (Ctrl) pressed.

speed_variation.message: Speed variation when the mouse wheel rotates:

support_request_instructions.message: Provide these infos when requesting support or reporting an issue.

volume_variation.message: Volume variation when the mouse wheel rotates:
